Text:
They're coming to take me away ho ho he he ha ha
to the funny farm where life is beautiful all the time, and I'll be happy to see those nice young men in their clean white coats
and they're coming to take me away ha ha
:-)  "First they ignore you.  Then they laugh at you.  Then they fight you.  And then you win."  MK Gandhi

I thought this was abouth the Death of Global Warming.  It would make more sense, because the Earth repairs itself and It will stop global warming.  Just check the last ten years of temperature just announced today.  No change at all.  Thanks to the Earth for running just has it always has.
No one should die for Global warming since it isn't.
